mapper.sql: t.id, t.registry_group, t.registry_key, t.registry_value, t.update_time, t.cpu_usage, t.memory_usage, t.running_tasks, t.load_score
mapper.select: SELECT t.id FROM job_registry AS t WHERE t.update_time < DATE_ADD(#{nowTime},INTERVAL -#{timeout} SECOND)
SELECT FROM job_registry AS t WHERE t.update_time > DATE_ADD(#{nowTime},INTERVAL -#{timeout} SECOND)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO job_registry( `registry_group` , `registry_key` , `registry_value`, `update_time`) VALUES( #{registryGroup} , #{registryKey} , #{registryValue}, #{updateTime}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `update_time` = #{updateTime}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM job_registry AS t WHERE t.registry_value = #{registryValue} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE job_registry SET cpu_usage = #{cpuUsage}, memory_usage = #{memoryUsage}, running_tasks = #{runningTasks}, load_score = #{loadScore}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE registry_value = #{registryValue}
